items.title: 2024 KIAS-SNU Physics Winter Camp
items.summary: 2024 KIAS-SNU Physics Winter Camp [fi=link] http://events.kias.re.kr/h/winter2024./?pageNo=5736 KIAS-SNU Physics Winter Camp는 물리학을…
items.content_html:
2024 KIAS-SNU Physics Winter Camp

[fi=link] http://events.kias.re.kr/h/winter2024./?pageNo=5736

KIAS-SNU Physics Winter Camp는 물리학을 전공하는 혹은 전공하고자 하는 대학 3~4 학년생, 졸업생, 그리고 대학원 과정을 이제 막 시작한 학생들을 위한 겨울학교입니다. 올해의 캠프에서는 양자 중력의 사실상 유일한 토이 모델인 Matrix Model, 초기 우주에서의 별과 은하에 대한 이야기를 비롯하여 네 가지의 긴 강의와 2024년 노벨 물리학상 해설을 포함한 콜로키움 등으로 구성되어 있습니다. 학생들의 적극적인 참여가 항상 놀라운 Group Project 역시 진행될 계획입니다.

Lectures

  • Instantons: Quantum Fluctuations and Gravity (Viatcheslav Mukhanov,, LMU & KIAS)
  • Physics of 2D Materials: Superconductivity, Magnetism, and Topology (유재준, 서울대)
  • Introduction to Random Matrix Models (이성재, KIAS)
  • Early Universe Cosmology: From Structure Formation to JWST's Early Galaxies (전명원, 경희대)

Colloquia

  • 2024 Nobel Physics Prize: Machine Learning and Physics (조정효, 서울대)
  • 2024 Nobel Chemistry Prize: Proteins' secrets revealed through computing and artificial intelligence (이상민, 포항공대)
  • Real Quantum Computers: Present and Future (김도헌, 서울대)

조직위원

  • 유재준, 박철환 (서울대)
  • 이필진, 이성재 (KIAS)

items.title: Tutorials
items.summary: Tutorials "An Introduction to the LDA+DMFT Approach to Correlated Electron Systems", DMFT…
items.content_html:
Tutorials

  • "An Introduction to the LDA+DMFT Approach to Correlated Electron Systems", DMFT Workshop, KIAS, Seoul, Korea, 30 March 2007
  • "A Short Introduction to the LDA+U Approach to Strongly Correlated Materials", The 2nd KIAS Workshop on Electronic Structure Calculations, KIAS, Seoul, Korea, May 2005
  • "Introduction to Magnetism and Magnetic Materials", 2005 KIAS-SNU Physics Winter Camp, 5-18 January 2005
  • "A Short Lecture on Electronic A Short Lecture on Electronic Structure Theory for Experimental Condensed Matter Physicists", 2004 Fall KPS Meeting, Jeju, Korea, 21 October 2004
  • "Local Density Functional Theory: Basics and its Applications", KISTI Tutorial Lecture, 31 August 2001

Articles

  • 계산물리적 방법을 통한 고체의 물성연구 ("물리학과 첨단기술", 1999. 10.)

items.title: Editors and IDE
items.summary: GNU Emacs is a self-documented editor for the advanced programmer. For more…
items.content_html:
Emacs


GNU Emacs is a self-documented editor for the advanced programmer. For more information, check the related pages:

  • Emacs Site-Map -- a wiki-based site for Emacs
  • GNU Emacs for Windows --
  • On-line resources -- on-line resources for the GNU Emacs

VS code

  • https://code.visualstudio.com
  • Code with GitHub Copilot 

Zed

  • https://zed.dev
  • The editor for what's next

items.title: LaTeX
items.summary: LaTeX Tips General LaTeX tips and tricks: http://www.kronto.org/thesis/tips/index.html Best websites: CTAN: The…
items.content_html:
LaTeX Tips

  • General LaTeX tips and tricks: http://www.kronto.org/thesis/tips/index.html
  • Best websites: CTAN: The Comprehensive TeX Archive Network and CTAN Search Page
  • LaTeX distribution: In linux, texlive, tetex; in windows, miktex
  • Editor: GNU Emacs with AUCTeX, or use Kile in Linux. In windows, try led
  • Drawing program: xfig or Dia to generation eps or pdf figures
  • Creating graphs: gnuplot or gri graphing language as an alternative
